thread.title: BRIEF-Marvell Shareholders Approve Issuance Of Common Shares In Connection With Proposed Acquisition Of Cavium

title: BRIEF-Marvell Shareholders Approve Issuance Of Common Shares In Connection With Proposed Acquisition Of Cavium
text: March 16, 2018 / 9:46 PM / Updated 16 minutes ago BRIEF-Marvell Shareholders Approve Issuance Of Common Shares In Connection With Proposed Acquisition Of Cavium Reuters Staff March 16 (Reuters) - Cavium Inc: * MARVELL SHAREHOLDERS APPROVE ISSUANCE OF COMMON SHARES IN CONNECTION WITH PROPOSED ACQUISITION OF CAVIUM, INC. * MARVELL- IN PRELIMINARY COUNT OF VOTING RESULTS, MORE THAN 99% VOTED IN FAVOR OF APPROVING ISSUANCE OF COâ€™S SHARES RELATED TO PROPOSED DEAL * MARVELL TECHNOLOGY GROUP SAYS EXPECTS TRANSACTION TO CLOSE MID-CALENDAR YEAR 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
